title: The Taliban says women in Afghanistan must wear head-to-toe clothing in public
content:
1. The Taliban says women in Afghanistan must wear head-to-toe clothing in public  NPR
  2. Taliban decree orders women in Afghanistan to cover their faces  CNN
  3. Taliban orders Afghan women to cover their faces in public  Al Jazeera English
  4. Afghanistan's Taliban order women to cover up head to toe  The Associated Press - en Español
  5. Taliban announce women must cover faces in public, say burqa is best  Yahoo News
